turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm great. Looking to order some pizzas from a pizzeria called Bella Luna if you have a minute.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get three small pizzas. They all three need to be a thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two veggie lover's, and one with pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 small thick crust pizzas, 2 are veggie lovers and one is pepperoni, for a total of 30 88.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. When will it be ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready in 30 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text.
